dct_title_s: An accurate map of North America. : Describing and distinguishing the British and Spanish dominions on this great continent ; according to the definitive treaty concluded at paris 10th Feb. 1763 also all the West India Islands belonging to and possessed by the several european princes and states. The whole laid down according to the latest and most authentick improvements
dct_description_sm: Inset maps: "The passage by land to California ..." --  "A particular map of Baffin and Hudsons Bay."; Shows boundaries, rivers, shoals roads, forests and settlements; articles from the treaty; notes about the region; arrows show prevailing wind direction.; Relief shown pictorially.; Longitude given from both Ferro and London meridians.
dct_publisher_sm: Printed for Robert Sayer ... as the Act directs (London)
